TopicTitle: Rovemax Model M1 Should Unpack and Inflate

Articles.Content:
A little one that has probably been on the list for a while, but now that improved aerodynamics and (hopefully!) fairings a nice bit of balance might be for the Rovemax M1 to come deflated and folded up for tighter packing. Hitting the "gear" button /right click/control group would then activate it, folding down and inflating in the field.

Just a thought
